titles.title: Define to Defeat Act of 2024
Define to Defeat Act of 2024
To provide a definition of antisemitism for the enforcement of covered civil rights laws.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committees on Oversight and Accountability, and Education and the Workforce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
